Applicant Name: John Doe 

Dear [Name], 

We need to conduct a thorough background check on you for the position of Sales Representative in our new company. This process requires that you provide us with your personal and financial information as well as your work references. 

To complete this background check, we would like to need you to provide certain information about your previous employment, education or any additional details about yourself. Following this process will give us a better understanding of your qualifications and working background, necessary for our decision-making process. 

Please contact us as soon as possible to obtain any additional documents that would be required for the background check process. 

Thank you
